entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia near noon. Wind becoming light near noon then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
